data.actual_result: Search parameters will flash each time the suggested channels change
data.expected_result: Suggested channels change depending on what you have typed
data.short_description: Deleting text in search flashes the search options each time the suggestions changes
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server with multiple channels - Open search and tap the "in" parameter - Type some text that will suggest channels, and then type some text so you have no suggested channels - Delete text until suggested channels pop up, and observe the suggestions - Delete more text until you delete everything except the "in" parameter - Observe the suggested channels each time you delete a letter
